entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
